website_summaries.verdict: Apart from some small flaws, the BeoPlay is an excellent wireless headphone that's very comfortable, well built, looks good on your head, and matches up well versus the competition.
pros: The Bang & Olufsen BeoPlay H7 has a sleek, sturdy design, with a metal and leather headband and plush earcups, not to mention excellent sound for Bluetooth
It also features touch controls in the right earcup and a replaceable rechargeable battery that delivers 20 hours of battery life
cons: It's fairly expensive, and we'd like to see a better case and dual microphones (for cell-phone calls) at this price point

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. Great clarity , punchy bass, good sound stage. & yes the volume is loud enough ... (unless you want to blow out your own ear-drums then its not!) Perfect workmanship & materials. Easy & precise touch controls : works even with workgloves on . (Dont know what's others conplaing about ?). And yes there was a faint "white noise"/ electronic background noice on prevous firmware 9.1.3. Latest firmware 9.1.7 fixed it. The battery seems to last forever ....about 20hrs. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound with nice bass
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for new blue tooth headphones that produced both a clear sound and good bass. I tried the Beats Studio Wireless, and although they had very nice bass, they lacked clarity. The Bose Soundlink II had very clear sound, but the bass was lacking. The Beoplay H7s were the best of both worlds. My only issue with them is that the ear cups are round instead of oval. I read that this had to do with sound stage, so I've learned to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, with the supplied cable or the blue tooth. Pairs very well to my iPhone and stays paired. The touch control takes a little getting used to, but it works. High-quality material, soft leather and quality construction. It reproduces the music the way it was recorded. Unlike some other manufacturers, these headphones do not introduce extra base to the sound. The supplied cable could be a bit longer with a built-in microphone so that I can talk on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic! Premium quality all around
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! Premium quality all around. My only gripe is that its fairly easy to accidentally pause/stop the music when you touch the headphone to adjust placement on your head. But that's not worth a demotion in points, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoel

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding, emphasis on mids and highs, although bass is warm and tight Comparing to the Sony MDR1A - sound is more open, less base, more high mids, tighter than the sony - means it better for my park walks (better wind seal and less noisy comparing to the sony which have more squicking plastic parts when walking). For longer listening the MDR1A are more comfortable and sound is more laid back. Very happy with the H7 purchase , they are great for my walks , which were the reason I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Isy Haiat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy, high quality headphones. The cans sit fairly comfortably (I have large ears, so they were more like on-ear than over-ear). Battery life is fantastic. It is annoying using them in bed; the controls on the outside of the cans are sensitive, and if you move your head slightly against the pillow, it will pause your signal.
customer_reviews.author: thinknb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price, come wireless and corded, great materials, and awesome design. I've had these for a couple months and use them every day, these have lasted really well so far. The only gripes I have is the headband area being a bit more cushioned for longer usage as I use these anywhere from 5-8 hrs daily and have to adjust so my head doesn't hurt. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rigo Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Product Malfunction after a Week
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, and having used B&O headphones since 2008, I was amazed at the value here. So I purchased and for a week or so, just great. BUT - these were clearly NOT brand new, despite being advertised as such. I purchased these only for use in my home studio, so they are not exposed to the elements and such - always in a soundproof booth on a stand. After a week they will NOT charge, so cannot be used wirelessly - which is extremely frustrating as this was the reason for the purchase. I didn't realize I hadn't bought from Amazon or B&O directly. Thus, I wouldn't recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, great battery life and they pair easily.
customer_reviews.text: These are not noise canceling, not an issue for me. I really like them for the sound quality, great battery life and they pair easily, the touch controls take some getting used to though, hopefully they will last longer than slide bars or knobs which always seem to get dirty and cause static and channel drop. That was my thought when I bought them anyways, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: LancetheUglyAndrogyne

customer_reviews.title: Sound is nice and battery life is good enough but there is ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is nice and battery life is good enough but there is a noticeable latency when used for watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: BCK

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones but they did not work with bluetooth (defective) ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones but they did not work with bluetooth (defective) so I returned. They sounded great when using a cord so no complaints regarding sound quality, construction or quality of materials....just got a bad pair.
customer_reviews.author: Cs2CentReview

customer_reviews.title: good sound, hurts my ears
customer_reviews.text: These are nice headphones as far as sound quality goes. I just wish I could wear them for more than a half hour without my ears hurting. The ear cups simply aren't large enough or deep enough, and I do not have big ears. I have a small head and only wear a size 7 hat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: The best over ear Bluetooth headphones I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: The best over ear Bluetooth headphones I have ever purchased. Exceptionally soft ear piece make for a very comfortable listening experience. The sound quality is amazing and the battery life is exceptional. The build quality feels very sturdy and you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Arrow

customer_reviews.title: Nice Build Quality... Mediocre Sound
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these because even though they are nice to look at they're poor sounding. Replaced with the incredible Beyerdynamic Amiron Wireless which have an even better build quality And outstanding sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are somewhat bass light on the stock setting, compared to the reference sound of the Shure SE846. However, you can use the BeoPlay app's ToneTouch feature to increase the bass significantly. Unlike most EQs, the sound does not distort even with extreme settings. The setting is remembered and will continue to work with any Bluetooth connection. ToneTouch does not work in wired mode.
customer_reviews.author: Monstieur

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My Sony wireless headphones recently died so i decided to purchase these headphones to replace. They're ok but definitely not worth the price. The bass is meh, no ice canceling is meh and if you at the gym or running they keep falling off your head. I'm going to back to the Sony mdr 950 with extra bass. Little bit more but totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Dream-like
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are an absolute delight. They sound fantastic when using a Bluetooth 4.0 transmitter, and are so light and comfortable that they feel like wearing a cloud. The materials feels luxurious but are also quite durable. I couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: PhilB3D

customer_reviews.title: Love these phones
customer_reviews.text: Love these phones, long battery life, very comfortable and outstanding audio. Very well balanced overall without the unreal booming bass of so many competing models
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service
customer_reviews.text: Speed delivery with Item arrived in one week, US - NZ. Works great and sound superb but hate the gesture control for the redial (who even use this??) cause I always accidentally called my friends when I want to play a song. There’s a buzzing sound but that’s normal on bluetooth and after a few sec of turning on or stopping a song, it’ll go away. Excellent build quality. 9/10 recommend and maybe will be buying the H9i as an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Afif Jazimin

customer_reviews.title: Impulse Buy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, but the sound quality is insane. Everyone is going to gripe about something but really they are incredible. Very comfortable and very premium. Stop reading these reviews and just buy them because they are so much cheaper now and you will not regret it
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Bought this on sale because it was a good deal. Ended up returning because although the sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale because it was a good deal. Ended up returning because although the sound quality was ok, the touch-buttons did not work properly. I could skip tracks but could not change the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Daid

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are very light and sound wonderful, and they are GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very light and sound wonderful, and they are GORGEOUS. The bass is tight with little bottom end exageration, the midrange is crystal clear and accurate (no lower midrange throatiness) and the high end sounds relatively flat and unexaggerated. The Bluetooth connection works every time without issue and the battery life seems excellent (haven't tested it out past 15 hours). I don't know why anybody would buy Master and Dynamic or Beats over this. It boggles my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kim

customer_reviews.title: Typical good B & O sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easily connects. Lighter than many other full size headphones. If you are familiar with the Bang & Olufsen soundstage, it sounds very similar to B&O H6. Very neutral tones. Replaceable battery is a very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff M

customer_reviews.title: Superb! This is my first B & O and ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb! This is my first B & O and it won't be the last.
customer_reviews.author: roberto torres

customer_reviews.title: Great sound cool looks
customer_reviews.text: Very good connectivity and sound. B&O are known for being the best
customer_reviews.author: Mauri

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far I found the touch feature to be very convenient. Overall I’m satisfied with what I get from H7 in terms of design and sound as well. However, the only downside is that even a carry pouch is not included in mine while I saw people complaining about having only a pouch so I don’t know...Guess I’ll have to get a bag/case myself then.
customer_reviews.author: Wasp

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are amazing! I'm hearing subtle nuances in some of my ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing! I'm hearing subtle nuances in some of my music that I have never heard before. I wear them for hours at a time at work and they are extremely comfortable. The construction is top-notch. I couldn't be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stroudsburger

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you don’t want to disturb your neighbors
customer_reviews.text: You’re better off buying a speaker because everyone can hear what you’re listening to with these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ruqia Mangal

customer_reviews.title: White Noise
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable white noise when music is paused or at low volume
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are beautiful and sounds great but to tight on ears.
customer_reviews.author: DMD

customer_reviews.title: May need to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cans. Great sound for a Bluetooth headphone and the build quality is excellent. Granddaughter won’t give them back.
customer_reviews.author: Cult Leader 92887

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on excellent quality wireless (or wired) headphones. Very good sound fidelity and the ability to adapt to the specific music being listened too is great. Fairly comfortable for extended use and do a pretty good job of isolating outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW J WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding headphones
customer_reviews.text: Incredible headphones. Amazing sound. Perfect mix of highs, mids and bass. Extraordinarily clean. They are not bulky and are very comfortable on head and ears. Best sounding and best designed headphones I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: timothy menta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic audio quality and decent comfort makes this headphone a winner. Make sure and update the firmware asap. Also, i noticed clarity and dynamic range improved after a few hours of full frequency burn-in.
customer_reviews.author: MA17

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but controls are a bit "touchy"
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of sound from these headphones. The touch controls are a bit tricky to master as well as a bit "touchy" when not applying the perfect amount of pressure and location on the ear piece. Fix that and you have 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine bolsinger

customer_reviews.title: perfect headset
customer_reviews.text: This one is money worth. I use it everyday. It is comfortable, Bluetooth activated, no noise. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: chicago lady

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, especially if on sale!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, super comfortable, and amazing sound quality. Definitely would recommend, especially if you can find them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Scott Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The build of these headphones are phenomenal. The sound is balanced just as I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: R. Blass

customer_reviews.title: They are solid and sound very nice especially with HD FLAC or AIFF tracks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking that they were simply going to blow me away. They didn't. They are solid and sound very nice especially with HD FLAC or AIFF tracks. However, they sound slightly muddy which really surprised me. I'm not saying I want uber-bright sound, but I do want uber-clear sound out of a pair of headsets with this price tag on them.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Headphones hiss
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, sound is decent, but has an audible hiss at all times while Bluetooth is connected.
customer_reviews.author: gotosleep

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, balanced sound. Have never been able to wear headphones for more than an hour before. Wore these for over 8 hours. battery life is great. I haven't had issues with the touch controls - they've been reliable for me so far. Wish they were a little louder sometimes, but great for tuning out and getting work done.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, horrible firmware.
customer_reviews.text: Update: The latest firmware makes the Bluetooth connectivity issue even worse. I have problems now on all my devices. I hate the H7. I would have given it 5 stars if it wasn't for the firmware problems. I have a lot of Bluetooth connectivity issues with it. I gave up on using it with my iMac and I use it exclusively now with my iPad and iPhone. But even on those, I have to fiddle with the Bluetooth settings often to get it to connect. It's a shame because the sound is amazing but the frustration to connect it detracts from the joy of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Akira

customer_reviews.title: Excellent High Range Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Solid build. Sound is even better. Range could be a little better but impressed with the quality of sound for bluetooth headphones. Look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't think there is a better product on the market Amazing sound!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bhos

customer_reviews.title: Poor microphone quality is overwhelming this review.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and comfortable with a design aesthetic that is unparalleled. The audio quality is top notch. Unfortunately, the microphone is subpar as all communication when taking a call is muted according to the recipient of the call. Additionally, the background noise is amplified as well making it even more difficult to have a conversation if you are outdoors or in an open office. I would not recommend these as a headset for someone looking to use them for phone calls in addition to listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Reddy

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are some of the best sounding bluetooth headphones I've heard
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are some of the best sounding bluetooth headphones I've heard. They have full AAC codec support so when paired with my iPhone the sound quality is on par with wired headphones. My only hesitation to give it 5 stars is the touchpad on the right ear cup sometimes causes you to accidentally make calls or stop the music.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: My other pair of Beats are far superior.
customer_reviews.text: Hardly used expensive headphones. Under 1 year old and they no longer work/charge. My other pair of Beats are far superior.
customer_reviews.author: This game is awesome

customer_reviews.title: Just good for exterior design!!
customer_reviews.text: After trying different headphones from good brands out there such as audio technicia , beyerdynamic, sennheiser, sony and etc for more than 8 years by now, I got pair of this headphone based on my friend suggestion. To be honest the quality of material used in this product is outstanding. packing and design of the headphone is 5 out of 5. However there are many cons in the sound quality and sound engineering of this headphone that make me return it on very first week! at least I can admit that is not a good hadphone for professional studio works or even dj performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Small high frequency noise can be heard when the music is not on
customer_reviews.author: Weiyang

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy. You cant lift weights while wearing them ...
customer_reviews.text: Top heavy. You cant lift weights while wearing them. If you look down or bend down they will shift on your head
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK, but too much bass for me. So went back for the H6.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wallner

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with the quality of the sound considering the hefty price for this headphone. I own a couple of headphones of the same price range (bose, parrot zik) so far Bang and Olufsen doesnt reach up to my expectations. I suggest you try it out and compare it with other high end brands before you decide on getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Doc KM

customer_reviews.title: the bluetooth does not work, using the cable is ...
customer_reviews.text: the bluetooth does not work, using the cable is the only way to use the product. Because I try to connect with my other devices by bluetooth, these devices including mac, iPad, which cannot research the H7 item in bluetooth list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was biased to really want these to be great. I love the H6 (the wired version of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was biased to really want these to be great. I love the H6 (the wired version of this). These, however, sound terrible with a cable in and only passable with Bluetooth. There are $30 junk Bluetooth headphones that sound better. There were times that I was almost convinced these sounded good because I really wanted them too. In the end, I had to return these. Go with the plantronics backbeat if you need overeat Bluetooth cans that sound anywhere close to the H6s.
customer_reviews.author: ppeng

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth works good, talking on phone mic and headphone works good
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth works good , talking on phone mic and headphone works good , when I play music with cord or on Bluetooth there is no good base or mid range - the apple head phone sound little better !
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Hand

customer_reviews.title: Not Noise Canceling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were advertised as noise cancelling. They are not noise canceling so I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you like to binge watch, as it doesn't let you do that, whiteout disconnecting each time
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if it would work, every time I switch to a new show it disconnects and I have to re connect.....what a waste....I will be returning this when I get back in town,
customer_reviews.author: J. Lotman

product_meta.title: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H7 Over-Ear Wireless Headphones - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackBeoplay H7 wireless headphones give you the freedom to experience Bang & Olufsen’s uncompromising Signature Sound when and where you want. Pair them with your favorite Bluetooth device to accompany you on a mobile audio journey – whether you’re listening to music or talking on the phone. Enjoy the unencumbered control that comes with an advanced touch interface; simply tap or swipe the right ear cup of these headphones to manage calls, change tracks, or adjust volume. The H7’s touch interface even works with gloves, so cold weather never has to get in the way of a hot tune. The Beoplay app lets you customize your listening experience via your smartphone or Apple watch to ensure you can enjoy music the way the artists intended. The advanced rechargeable battery technology of these Bluetooth headphones provides up to 20 hours of wireless playtime, shutting off after 15 minutes of no use to conserve power. Should you somehow outlast your headphones' battery, you can always plug in and keep listening. Designed by Jakob Wagner, these chic headphones possess an honest, authentic charm you can feel in their clean lines and premium materials. Sturdy but lightweight with anodized aluminum and soft lambskin leather materials, these headphones offer a comfortable and luxurious fit you can enjoy all day, or night, long.
feature_bullets: Innovative and intuitive aluminum touch interface to skip tracks, hit play and pause, control volume and answer calls
Rechargeable and replaceable battery with up to 20 hours playtime
Luxurious materials like aluminum and genuine leather; a pleasure to wear, a pleasure to use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars321 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
